QuestData.Title: Finish The Job
QuestData.Description: We have been trying to collect useful scraps from the front all week. Every time we gather a batch to bring back to camp, we get assaulted by the restless soldiers in the area. Can you head over there and clear them out?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Restless Soldiers at the Restless Front. You can find the front on the west side of the island, just before Forgotten Hill.
QuestData.RewardText: It's about time someone took those guys out.
